website_summaries.verdict: MSI's GeForce GTX 1660 Ti Gaming X 6G is exceptional at doing what it's designed to do: deliver a moderate-cost GPU option to gamers in search of high refresh rates in 1080p.
pros: Beats previous-generation GTX cards on both sides of its price
cons: MSI's upclocked card closer in pricing to RTX 2060 Founders Edition than most GTX 1660 Ti cards

customer_reviews.title: All you need for 1080p gaming
customer_reviews.text: runs cool and looks fantastic , if all you want is 1080p 60 fps high settings then this is the card for you. it can even do 1440p 60 fps in (most games that are not demanding). it beats GTX 1070 in mostly all games . just make sure you pair it with at least 4 cores cpu. like i5 or any ryzen cpu.
customer_reviews.author: Sulaiman

customer_reviews.title: all around best value card on the market (kinda 2060 still a good buy)
customer_reviews.text: the reason the value for money is 4 stars is because you can get much cheaper versions but its still 4 stars for the oc factor that comes with it also runs super cool in vr without me having to even crank the fan speed past 55 stays around 50 degrees and its a pretty nice card to go with my rainbow rgb on white and black case aesthetic so all in all recommended buy (when the price is around 300 no more maybe less).
customer_reviews.author: curtis lowrie

customer_reviews.title: Msi 1660ti gaming x
customer_reviews.text: Msi 1660ti gaming x After quite a bit of research i ended up with getting this graphic card and i must say I'm not disappointed... Excellent quality and built... Quite and cool, never gone over 62°while gaming,40°idle...fan start spinning after around 58°... If you stuck between getting this or other cheaper model i suggest don't waste your money on them and buy this without hesitation.. And if you stuck between this and 2060 make sure go for high end quality 2060 otherwise you end up with a noisy and hot gpu
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: MSI GTX 1660Ti
customer_reviews.text: - Worth the value - High performance GPU - Looks bad-ass in case - Work well with MSI Afterburn
customer_reviews.author: Nat Ketudom

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a really cute comic
customer_reviews.text: My PC runs so fast with this plus all the other parts I bought, but the best thing is the cute dragon comic explaining how to install the graphics card. MSi has won me over with that alone. I downloaded MSi Mystic Light but it didn't seem to actually install, so I still can't control the lights, but I just haven't tried hard enough to make it work, since I've left that changing colour by itself and my other parts are synced with Asus Aura. I'm sure you'll be able to do it fine; I just haven't put the effort into finding how to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: A consolidated platform that offers all software including MYSTIC LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: TORX Fan 3.0 - Dispersion fan blade: Steep curved blade accelerating the airflow. - Traditional fan blade: Provides steady airflow to massive heat sink below. Mastery of Aerodynamics: The heatsink is optimized for efficient heat dissipation, keeping your temperatures low and performance high. Zero Frozr technology: Stopping the fan in low-load situations, keeping a noise-free environment.
customer_reviews.author: Zsolt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for an excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. It was a great price, and it performs fantastically. Very quiet and runs the more challenging games very well. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mid-High Range GPU
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great mid high range graphics card. Can be quite loud. Nice sleek RGB lighting. Does the job it is supposed to when it comes to gaming with very reasonable fps
customer_reviews.author: Darragh

customer_reviews.title: 60fps gaming
customer_reviews.text: Silent and great fps across all modern and older games. 60fps gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Good quiet mid-range card.
customer_reviews.text: Good mid-range card with minimal noise. The quiet fans only spin up when needed and even then are quiet.
customer_reviews.author: George T

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Best deal
customer_reviews.text: Best deal out there. Satisfied with service and the card worked perfect which was expected from MSI.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: I was about to buy a 2070, but bought this instead, and I'm glad. Much lower price, almost as powerful GPU. The RGB looks great, and it runs surprisingly quiet, even while playing Destiny 2 at max graphics. I don't know much about computers, but I do know that this thing WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant graphics card I’ve been playing all sorts with it even some quite demanding games with no problems. The max heat it reaches is about 46*c. Really recommend buying this one as it hasn’t let me down plus it’s looks awesome in your system!
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: A step up from my GTX 1050ti
customer_reviews.text: Going from a pre-installed Pc with a 1050ti - with the 1660ti, the difference is night and day; in performance and what it can handle in general, is just a step up and is a perfect upgrade from what I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Caolan

customer_reviews.title: Top 1080p
customer_reviews.text: Loving it so far. Replaced an original 1660 with it as I had an issue with fan bearings and figured I'd pony up the extra bit of dough for the Ti and I'm glad I did. Basically runs fanless most of the time, but when they do kick in you can't audiably tell.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nevison

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful card that runs cool
customer_reviews.text: The card plays triple A titles at ultra and is perfect for 1080P gaming. If you dont need ray tracing I would recommend this over a 2060 as card has super cooling and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Russell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this graphics card. But then, I did take several days to research what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but hard to install drivers if you don't have a disc reader. Nonetheless, still good.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A good gaming card
customer_reviews.text: A good GPU, performance and price were in the sweet spot for my system.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O Brien

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected nice and quickly, working as expected! Perfect for 1080p 144hz or 2160p at 60-100 fps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Can’t fault this budget card....will play most games over 60fps
customer_reviews.author: Steven Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Would have got 2 if it supported SLI
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money plus the rgb lighting looks awesome
customer_reviews.author: Frf

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to transcode video on a home media server, and so far it hasn't skipped a beat. For the price and the power you're getting from a card - this thing is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: Silent but deadly
customer_reviews.text: I now have a very quiet pc temperature around 60° even in new games . Performance is excellent and the bonus is the very low power draw. Has to be the best all round card available at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: james

product_meta.title: MSI Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660Ti Gaming X 6G Graphics Card 6 GB GDDR6, 1875 Hz, RGB Mystic Light, 3x DisplayPort, HDMI, Dual Fan Cooling System
product_meta.description: The new Nvidia GTX 1660TI, featuring Turing Architecture, 1536 Cuda Cores and 6Gb GDDR6 memory. NVIDIA GeForce® GTX is the ultimate PC gaming experience. Truly game-changing performance. Innovative gaming technologies. Seamless, cinematic experiences in 4K, HDR, and beyond. Even immersive, next-gen VR. This is gaming perfected

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars253 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
